articles.title: Rumeli Dhar announces retirement from cricket, India | Cricbuzz.com - Cricbuzz - Cricbuzz
articles.description: An all-rounder, Dhar was a key figure when India reached the WODI World Cup final in 2005 in South Africa
articles.content: Dhar, 38, played 4 Tests, 78 ODIs and 18 T20Is for India. Having made her international debut way back in 2003 against England, Dhar also made a comeback to the national team in 2018, after a gap of … [+1146 chars]
